Get Mean Ratio for Each Gene x Cell Type

Source: R/get_mean_ratio2.R
get_mean_ratio2.Rd

Get Mean Ratio for Each Gene x Cell Type

get_mean_ratio2(
  sce,
  cellType_col = "cellType",
  assay_name = "logcounts",
  add_symbol = TRUE
)

Arguments

sce

Single cell experiment object
cellType_col

Column name on colData of the sce that denotes the celltype
assay_name

Name of assay to use for calculation

Value

Table of mean ratio for each x cell type

Examples

get_mean_ratio2(sce.test)

#> # A tibble: 1,750 x 9
#>    gene  cellType.target mean.target cellType   mean ratio rank_ratio Symbol
